entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who came to live here and was probably starving for affection. He is also mentioned in the context of his death.

entities.name: miss cissy
entities.description: Miss Cissy is mentioned as one of the house-elves who were treated nicely by Kreacher.

entities.name: miss bella
entities.description: Miss Bella is mentioned as another house-elf who was treated nicely by Kreacher.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is being comforted by Harry after Sirius's death. He is also mentioned as someone who told Miss Cissy and Miss Bella everything they wanted to know.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a wizard who paid for how he treated house-elves.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who said that Sirius never saw Kreacher as a being with feelings like a human's.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in this passage and is interacting with Kreacher.

relationships.description: Sirius treated Kreacher nicely, as evidenced by the fact that Kreacher told Miss Cissy and Miss Bella everything they wanted to know.
Voldemort abused house-elves, which is why he paid for it.
Dumbledore made a statement about Sirius not seeing Kreacher as a being with feelings like a human's.
Harry comforted Kreacher after his sobbing fit.
